questions.question: The committee decided ---- the project until more funding became available.
questions.explanation: 'decide' fiili infinitive alır: 'decided to postpone'.

questions.question: She enjoys ---- about complex philosophical questions.
questions.explanation: 'enjoy' fiili gerund alır: 'enjoys thinking'.

questions.question: I remember ---- her at the conference last year.
questions.explanation: 'remember + gerund' = geçmişte olan bir şeyi hatırlamak. 'Last year' geçmiş zaman göstergesi.

questions.question: Don't forget ---- your passport when you go to the airport.
questions.explanation: 'forget + infinitive' = yapılması gereken şeyi unutma. Gelecek eylem.

questions.question: The researchers tried ---- different methods to improve accuracy.
questions.explanation: 'try + gerund' = bir yöntem denemek. Farklı metodları denediler.

questions.question: He stopped ---- after his doctor warned him about health risks.
questions.explanation: 'stop + gerund' = bir eylemi durdurmak/bırakmak. Sigara içmeyi bıraktı.

questions.question: After analyzing the data, the team went on ---- the report.
questions.explanation: 'go on + infinitive' = sonraki eyleme geçmek. Veri analizinden sonra rapor yazmaya geçtiler.

questions.question: She is very good at ---- complex problems quickly.
questions.explanation: Preposition (at) + gerund. 'Good at + -ing'.

questions.question: They managed ---- the deadline despite numerous obstacles.
questions.explanation: 'manage' fiili infinitive alır: 'managed to meet'.

questions.question: I regret ---- you that your application was unsuccessful.
questions.explanation: 'regret + infinitive' = formal olarak bir şey söylemekten üzüntü duymak. 'Regret to inform' standart yapı.

questions.question: She avoided ---- about her previous job during the interview.
questions.explanation: 'avoid' fiili gerund alır: 'avoided talking'.

questions.question: We need ---- a decision before the end of the week.
questions.explanation: 'need' fiili infinitive alır: 'need to make'.

questions.question: He tried ---- the problem but failed to find a solution.
questions.explanation: 'try + infinitive' = çaba göstermek, gayret etmek. 'but failed' ifadesi çaba gösterdiğini destekliyor.

questions.question: I look forward to ---- from you soon.
questions.explanation: 'look forward to + gerund'. 'to' burada preposition olduğu için gerund kullanılır.

questions.question: She suggested ---- the meeting to next week.
questions.explanation: 'suggest' fiili gerund alır: 'suggested postponing'.

questions.question: He stopped ---- a cup of coffee on his way to work.
questions.explanation: 'stop + infinitive' = bir şey yapmak için durmak. Kahve içmek için durdu.

questions.question: They are interested in ---- more about the research project.
questions.explanation: Preposition (in) + gerund. 'Interested in + -ing'.

questions.question: I'll never forget ---- the Northern Lights for the first time.
questions.explanation: 'forget + gerund' = geçmişte olan bir şeyi unutmak. Geçmiş deneyim.

questions.question: The company expects ---- significant growth next year.
questions.explanation: 'expect' fiili infinitive alır: 'expects to achieve'.

questions.question: She went on ---- for hours without realizing the time.
questions.explanation: 'go on + gerund' = aynı eyleme devam etmek. Konuşmaya devam etti.
